title: What To Do If Your Channel Gets Hacked | How It Happens, How I Got It Back, and How to Avoid It

title: The Birthday Book TAG...On My Birthday
description:
Mike does the Birthday Book Tag on his 44th birthday.

Channels mentioned this episode:
@slowlyred2082 
@PhilipChaseTheBestofFantasy 
@B.LEE.DbrianleedurfeeREVIEWS 
@AndrewsWizardlyReads 

Questions for this TAG

BIRTHDAY CAKE â€“ a book with a plot that seems clichÃ© but you adore it anyway
UNOPENED GIFTS â€“ your most anticipated book release this year
BIRTHDAY PRESENTS â€“ a book that surprised you with how much you loved it
THE HAPPY BIRTHDAY SONG â€“ a book that certainly deserved all the hype it got
BIRTH YEAR - A book that was published the year you were born
GETTING OLDER â€“ a book that you read a long time ago, but you think that you would appreciate it more if you read it as a more mature reader
SWEET BIRTHDAY MEMORIES â€“ a book that kept you incredibly happy during a sad or demanding period of your life
PARTY GUESTS - If you could spend your birthday with any fictional character, who would it be and why?
TIME OF THE SEASON - Find a book that takes place in the season you were born in
COLOR OF LOVE - Find a book that is the color of your birthstone
PARTY ANYWHERE - Pick a book set in a time period, world, or country you would like to have been born in
30+ CLUB - Name a book or series with a protagonist that is 30 years old or greater
BIRTHDAY MEMORIES - A book that represents who you were when you were younger
THIS BIRTHDAY - A book that represents where you are in your life now
EVERY BIRTHDAY - A book that represents something that has never changed about you
HAPPY MUSIC â€“ a book with some very beautiful and truly memorable quotes
